body:
As you can tell by the title, I'm releasing a new RP for people to use, a default edit mainly optimized for PvP on servers like Kohi and Badlion, but can be used for normal play on other servers as well. 

Why Red Edit? 

Because in PvP when you hit another player, they turn red, so by making red armour, dia swords, etc. It makes It so the game has to process less, and actually gives you decently higher FPS when PvPing, the particles aren't laggy either. 

Pack Download: http://www.mediafire.com/download/nw4udt7jukm4q4w 
                          http://www.mediafire.com/download/nw4udt7jukm4q4w  
                          http://www.mediafire.com/download/nw4udt7jukm4q4w  

Normal Colouration Edit: https://www.mediafire.com/?vaod2927454udjb 

Preview (Noarmal): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YJ3nnqIISUw#t=175 
I'm not trying to promote, but I don't really feel like taking more screenshots.

title: New RP Release: Stimulating's Defualt Edits

replies.body: Looks great, but the only problem I have with it is that it's red. Kinda hard to tell when the opponent is taking damage. Other than that, great job!
replies.body_tagged: Looks great, but the only problem I have with it is that it's red. Kinda hard to tell when the opponent is taking damage. Other than that, great job!

replies.body: ehh. I was expecting better cursor.
replies.body_tagged: ehh. I was expecting better cursor.

replies.body:
I may change that in the Future, but you can go into icons, and in the very top left corner is where the cursor is and you can change it using photo editing programmes. 

%appdata% in search bar for Windows, .minecraft>resourcepacks>my pack>assets>textures>gui>icons.png and edit that file

replies.body:
I was thinking about releasing my Normal edit, which is almost identical, except for different coloured sword and the handle design is slightly different, particles are nicer (IMO) and the armour is Light Blue

ty
